fields.name: Edit_Confirmation_Message
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you wish to edit this meter? A meter update record will be created.

fields.name: Existing_Meter_Update_Message
fields.fieldText: There is an in-progress Meter Update on this Meter, please complete it before creating another Meter Update.

fields.name: No_Active_Withdrawals_Message
fields.fieldText: This meter cannot be moved because it is not related to a withdrawal.

fields.name: Not_Active_On_Site_Body
fields.fieldText: You cannot enter removal date for a meter that is not approved and active on site.

fields.name: Success_Message
fields.fieldText: A new Meter Update record has been created. Click here to open it.
